action.content: Students are travelling to UCI for 3 days. Create a hilarious itinerary for them. Do not use the word 'university'. Your entire response should have exactly 4 paragraphs.  Separate paragraphs with the markdown divider: ***
action.label: context

action.content:
***

Day 1: Arrival and Acclimation
Upon arrival, students will be greeted with a warm welcome and a hearty breakfast feast. The day will begin with a campus tour, where they will explore the beautiful grounds and get familiar with the surroundings. In the afternoon, they will participate in a fun icebreaker session, where they will engage in hilarious team-building activities and get to know each other better. The evening will be filled with a delicious dinner and a movie night, where they will watch a classic comedy film to set the tone for the rest of the trip.

***

Day 2: Adventure and Exploration
The second day will be filled with adventure and exploration. Students will participate in a thrilling outdoor activity, such as rock climbing or zip lining, which will test their physical limits and push them out of their comfort zones. In the afternoon, they will visit a local attraction, such as a museum or a theme park, where they will learn something new and have a blast. The evening will be filled with a fun game night, where they will engage in board games and card games, and enjoy each other's company.

***

Day 3: Reflection and Departure
The final day will be a reflection day, where students will reflect on their experiences and memories from the past two days. They will participate in a group discussion, where they will share their thoughts and feelings about the trip. In the afternoon, they will participate in a creative activity, such as painting or writing, where they will express their creativity and showcase their talents. The evening will be filled with a farewell dinner, where they will say their goodbyes and thank each other for the memories.

***

The trip will conclude with a final farewell ceremony, where students will receive a parting gift and a certificate of completion. They will depart with a newfound sense of camaraderie and a lifetime of memories. The trip will be a memorable experience for all, and they will cherish the moments they shared together for years to come.
action.label: response
